ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a subject for the task template is specified where this is an active record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
!$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT(ISBLANK( OW_task_type__c ))
&&
ISPICKVAL( OW_status__c, "Active" )
&&
ISBLANK( OW_subject__c )
